metadata.description: Spells that destroy magic, dispel effects, and drain magical power

spells.name: Demon's Eternal Oblivion
spells.description: Destroys a demon, spirit, or summoned creature with Might less than the spell level. Higher level versions can affect more powerful beings.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (destroy supernatural being), +2 Voice, -1 for specific targets

spells.name: Unraveling the Fabric of Magic
spells.description: Dispels an ongoing magical effect of level 10 or lower. The magic simply ceases to function and cannot be reactivated.

spells.name: Wind of Mundane Silence
spells.description: Dispels all magical effects of level 15 or lower within a room-sized area. Affects ongoing spells, magical items, and supernatural phenomena.

spells.name: Sever the Mystical Connection
spells.description: Destroys an arcane connection between the target and another person, place, or thing. The connection cannot be reestablished through normal means.

spells.name: Decay the Empowered Object
spells.description: Permanently destroys the magical properties of an enchanted item, leaving it as a mundane object. The physical item remains intact.

spells.name: Curse of the Mundane Existence
spells.description: Suppresses the target's magical abilities. Magi cannot cast spells, magical creatures lose their powers, and magical items do not function.

spells.name: Aegis of the Hearth
spells.description: Creates a magical barrier around a covenant that repels hostile magic and supernatural creatures. Higher level versions provide stronger protection.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (ward against magic), +1 Touch, +4 Year, +4 Boundary, +3 for ritual

spells.name: Drain the Body of Power
spells.description: Drains vis from the target's body, extracting 1 pawn of vis per 5 levels of spell. The vis appears as crystalline fragments.

spells.name: Circular Ward Against Demons
spells.description: Creates a circular ward that demons and infernal creatures cannot cross. The ward remains as long as the physical circle is unbroken.
spells.guidelines: Base 4 (ward against supernatural), +1 Touch, +2 Ring, +2 Circle

spells.name: Void of Magical Annihilation
spells.description: Completely destroys all magical power in the target. Magi lose all Arts permanently, magical creatures are drained of Might, and items become mundane.
